post.alphaxiv1:
LLMs struggle with physical reasoning 

 PHYBench is a new benchmark with 500 real-world physics problems. 

 📉 Even top models fall short of human accuracy 📊 Highlights the challenge of true physical reasoning 

 Trending #1 on alphaXiv 📈
post.alphaxiv2:
🚨Don’t miss out on this high-impact week for AI and reinforcement learning, featuring greedy agents, test-time RL, and a powerful new benchmark for LLM physical reasoning 🚀 

 Check out the top 10 papers for the week👇 

 - TTRL: Test-Time Reinforcement Learning
 - PHYBench: Holistic Evaluation of Physical Perception and Reasoning in Large Language Models
 - LLMs are Greedy Agents: Effects of RL Fine-tuning on Decision-Making Abilities
 - Describe Anything: Detailed Localized Image and Video Captioning
 - Does Reinforcement Learning Really Incentivize Reasoning Capacity in LLMs Beyond the Base Model?
 - EasyEdit2: An Easy-to-use Steering Framework for Editing Large Language Models
 - Planet as a Brain: Towards Internet of AgentSites based on AIOS Server
 - Tina: Tiny Reasoning Models via LoRA 
- Learning to Reason under Off-Policy Guidance
 - Boosting Generative Image Modeling via Joint Image-Feature Synthesis
post.releasepaper:
🤔 Can Large Language Models truly grasp physics? 
 🌍 Introducing PHYBench! ✨ 

 The PHYBench team is thrilled to announce our paper "PHYBench: Holistic Evaluation of Physical Perception and Reasoning in Large Language Models" went LIVE on arXiv on April 22, 2025! 🚀 

  We've built a comprehensive benchmark to evaluate LLMs' physical perception and reasoning capabilities. 
 📊 Curious how current models fare in understanding the physical world? 
 👇 Read the full paper here:
post.hfrank:
🥳 HUGE NEWS! Absolutely THRILLED! 🎉 

 Our dataset has successfully climbed to the #️⃣🥉 spot (Third Place!) on the Hugging Face Datasets Trending list! ✨ Exactly on May 1, 2025! This is incredible! 🚀 

 A massive THANKS to the entire global community! 🙏 Your attention, stars, and usage have given our work such amazing recognition! 🤗 

  Haven't checked it out yet? 👇 Explore our dataset on Hugging Face now and let's accelerate AI research together!
